Sofia es una mujer de 46 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con su esposo y sus hijos, ella es trabajadora, entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Sofia no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional.
Por iniciativa propia, Sofia trabaja como cocina en un restaurante de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Sofia se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada realizara el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que desea tarrajear y pintar las paredes de su hogar, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ver a sus hijos convertidos en buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Sofia is a 46 year old woman who lives in Nazca with her husband and children. She is a hard-working, enthusiastic person who puts a lot of effort into helping her family get ahead. Unfortunately, due to insufficient financial resources and having to work, Sofia was not able to get a degree.

On her own initiative Sofia works in the kitchen of a restaurant in her town. She works every day for approximately 10 hours and thinks she is doing well because of her dedication and effort.

Sofia is very thankful to Kiva lenders, since she will be able to make improvements to her house thanks to their help, as she wishes to plaster and paint the walls of her home. She will continue to work and strive to achieve her big dream of seeing her children turn into good professionals.

loans.use: to make improvements to her house

loans.name: Mary Salome

texts.en:
Mary Salome is 32 years old and lives in Basirang,Tudela, Philippines. She is single with no children. 

Mary Salome has a motorcycle business and earns approximately PHP 3000 each month. A member of PMPC for two years, she has requested a loan to purchase materials for motorcycle repair.

Mary Salome hopes to save for future needs.

loans.use: to purchase materials for motorcycle repair

loans.name: Jhandher Marlon

texts.es:
Jhandher vive en al ciudad de Pucallpa y para poder salir adelante y solventar los gastos de su hogar, ya que es padre de un pequeño de 1 año, Trabaja como obrero en una pequeña empresa de ensamblaje, el labora alrededor de 9 horas al día y cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es responsable y cumplido.

Jhandher está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo podrá comprar materiales de construcción como clavos, calaminas, madera, entre otros para realizar mejoras en el techo de la vivienda que habita, así podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y seguir luchando por cumplir su sueño:2 Darle una buena educación a su hijo y tener su propio taller de ensamblaje.
texts.en:
Jhandher lives in the city of Pucallpa and to get ahead and be able to cover household expenses since he’s father of a one-year-old little one works as a laborer in a small assembly plant; he works about 9 hours daily and believes he does well because he’s responsible and correct.

Jhandher is grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided he will be able to buy building supplies like nails, plywood and lumber, among others, to repair the roof at home where he lives thus improving his family’s quality of life and continue striving to reach his dream: to provide his son with a good education and to own an assembly shop of his own.

loans.use: to buy building supplies to repair his roof.

loans.name: Balvina Elias

texts.es: Balvina Elias lleva ya recibiendo el apoyo de fape y kiva desde hace mas de tres años, esta agradecida por tal ayuda. Desde hace mas de 18 años se ha dedicado a la crianza de marranos y solicita el crédito para la compra de marranos, concentrado  y vitaminas. ya que se aserca la epoca de fin de años y es cuendo sus animales mas se venden Ha sido bien responsable en sus pagos y no a caido en mora espera nuevamente el apoyo de Kiva para seguir con su negocio.
texts.en: Balvina Elias has been getting support from FAPE and KIVA for more than three years and she’s grateful for it.  She’s been raising pigs for more than 18 years and is asking for this loan to buy pigs, feed concentrate and vitamins for the end-of-year season when these animals sell the most is approaching.  He’s been quite responsible with her installment payments and has never been late.  She’s hoping once again for Kiva’s support to continue with her business.

loans.use: to buy pigs to raise.

loans.name: Yong's Group

texts.en:
Yong, who is 41 years old, is the mother of three children—who still count on her. 

To overcome the family’s hardship, she grows rice as the main source of income, whereas her husband works for others for a fee. She has been involved in her current business for 10 years. With VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), she is in the sixth cycle of her loans and a leader of a group of four borrowers. 

The past loans, which she has repaid back completely, have upgraded her living condition better than before. 

As the leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer for her crop. She hopes that she can gain a good yield from her business, better than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her crop

loans.name: Luis Armando

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre de 20 años, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial con su esposa y suegros,el es muy trabajador, entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Luis no ha podido estudiar una carrera profesional.
Por iniciativa propia, Luis trabaja como obrero de campo en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Luis se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada realizara la construcción de una habitación en casa de sus suegros, el cual utilizara para vivir con su esposa, así pues el seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Luis is a 20 year old man who lives with his wife and in-laws in the city of Cañete in the district of Imperial. He is very hardworking and enthusiastic and makes every effort to get ahead. Unfortunately Luis has not been able to study for a professional career due to a lack of resources and the need to work.

On his own initiative, Luis works as a farm laborer on an estate in the city. He works every day for approximately 10 hours and believes that he is doing well because of his dedication and sacrifice.

Luis is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to their help, he will be able to add a room to his in-law’s home, which he will use to live in with his wife. Thus he will continue working and aspiring to fulfill his great dream, that of owning a home.

loans.use: to add a room.

loans.name: Sophang's Group

texts.en:
Sophang, who is 20 years old and married, lives in Moung Russey district of Battambang province, where rice farming is the most popular crop. Sopang  farms rice as her main source of income. This business returns her about 30,300 KHR per day. 

Now requesting her first loan for with Kiva partner VisionFund, Sophang leads a group of four. She will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer and insecticide for her crop. She hopes that she can gain a yield better than last year's.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and insecticide for her crop

loans.name: Victor Miguel

texts.es:
Victor vive en la provincia de Ica, para poder tener ingresos y poder solventar sus gastos de manutención el trabaja en el área de almacén de una empresa de transportes de su ciudad, Victor trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y cree que le está yendo viene en su trabajo es porque es responsable.

Victor está agradecido con el apoyo que le han brindado los prestamistas kiva ay que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar una refrigeradora para su madre con lo cual mejorara su calidad de vida ya que actualmente no cuenta con este artefacto y no puede conservar sus alimentos en buenas condiciones, de esta manera mejorara su calidad de vida y seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su sueño:” Tener una casa propia”
texts.en:
Victor lives in Ica Province.  To earn income and be able to cover household expenses he works in the warehouse of a transport firm in his city. He works about 10 hours daily and believes he’s doing well at work because he’s responsible.

Victor is grateful for the support Kiva lenders have given him because thanks to it he will be able to buy a refrigerator for his mother which will improve her quality of life since she currently does not own this appliance and is unable to keep her food in good condition.  He will thus improve her quality of life and continue striving to make his greatest dream reality: to own a house.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.en:
Sabina lives in the Kisii area of Kenya. She is married and has 6 children. She has the following: a cow, poultry, motorcycle, and mosquito net, but does not have a pig, pump, bicycle, automobile, electricity, solar power, running water, sewing machine, TV, or DVD. Sabina has practiced farming for 4 years. Her primary sources of income are milk, eggs, and transportation services.

Sabina stated that what is most enjoyable about farming is feeding her cows, while her biggest challenge is getting a ready market for selling milk. Animals on the farm have been given the name of Nyabite.

When asked why she chose Juhudi Kilimo for this loan, Sabina replied, "It offers good and fair interest rates." She was also asked what was learned during Juhudi's required microfinance training session and answered, "How to manage a loan."

Sabina's highest monthly expense is school fees. When asked how this loan will benefit her family, she replied, "it will increase milk for sale and for family consumption."

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Francia Ines

texts.es: Doña Francia  es originaria de san Marcos, Carazo, casada y madre de dos hijos. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de refrescos  y recargas electrónicas.  Esta agradecida con Kiva y MiCredito por haberle otorgado el credito anterior ya que este fue de mucha ayuda para mejorar su calidad de vida y abastecer a sus clientes. Ella utilizo el credito anterior para comprar gaseosas al por mayor y recargas. Solicita este nuevo crédito para comprar: jugos, gaseosas al por mayor y recargas telefónicas con el fin de abastecer su negocio y satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Estima que el crédito será de mucha ayuda ya que aumentara sus ventas e ingresos.  su meta próxima es mejorar la infraestructura de su casa.
texts.en:
Francia’s from San Marcos, Carazo.  She’s married and mother of two children.  She’s a merchant by profession.  She sells soft-drinks and phone charge cards.  She’s grateful to Kiva and MiCrédito for granting her previous loan that was of much help for her to improve her quality of life and to supply her customers.

She used the previous loan to buy soft-drinks at wholesale and mobile phone charge cards.  She’s asking for this new loan to buy juices and soft-drinks at wholesale and phone recharge cards to stock her business and meet  customer demand.  She figures that the loan will be of great help to her for her sales and income will increase.  Her next goal is to make improvements to her home’s infrastructure.

loans.use: to buy juice and soft-drinks at wholesale and to buy mobile phone charge cards.

loans.name: Luisa Etelvina

texts.es:
Luisa es una mujer de 52 años, vive en la ciudad de Pisco, ella es vida desde hace 10 años, Luisa es una persona entusiasta, trabajadora, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante.
Por iniciativa propia, Luisa trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes y bebidas, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Luisa se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva,ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada comprará mayor cantidad y variedad de abarrotes y bebidas para abastecer su negocio, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener una vivienda segura y adecuada.
texts.en:
Luisa, 52, lives in the city of Pisco.  She’s been a widow for ten years.  Luisa’s enthusiastic and hardworking and focuses all he efforts into getting ahead.

On her own initiative she works in a small business selling groceries and beverages.  She works every day for about 10 hours and believes she does well because of her dedication and effort.

Luisa’s grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support they provided she will buy larger amounts and variety of groceries and beverages to stock her store.  She will then continue working and striving to reach her great dream: to have a safe, proper home.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: So's Group

texts.en:
So is a mother in her early 30s residing in Battambang province.  She is blessed with three dependent kids, who are in school. 

The main sources of her family’s income are from rice farming and trading recycled items. Currently, the main challenge for her business is the shortage of working capital to support her two businesses. 

To overcome this challenge, she forms a group of three to get a new loan. So is a third-time borrower whereas her co-borrowers in a group of three are first-time borrowers with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner).  As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and to buy more recycled items for resale. 

She hopes that his purchase will support her business on time so that she can gain a good income from both her businesses.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and more recycled items for resale

loans.name: Ricardo Jose

texts.es:
El joven Ricardo de 21 años de edad es originario de la ciudad de Jinotega, casado y se dedica a la venta de bisutería fina. Empieza  esta actividad hace tres años motivado por su esposa y  un amigo quien le ayuda a comercializar sus productos. 
Ricardo es dedicado a su trabajo y con mucho esfuerzo él ha logrado mantener su negocio estable. Comercializa sus productos en un punto de la ciudad donde hay movimiento de muchas personas. Él solicita este crédito para comprar: collares, pulseras, anillos y aretes con el fin de obtener mayores ingresos ya que esta temporada  es visitada por muchos turistas. Estima que este crédito será de mucha ayuda ya que aumentara su inventario, obteniendo mayores ventas e ingresos. Su plan futuro es comprar un terreno para construir su casa.
texts.en:
Ricardo, 21, is a young man from the city of Jinotega.  He’s married and works selling fine costume jewelry.  He started this activity three years ago motivated by his wife and a friend who helps him sell his products.

Ricardo is dedicated to his work and with much effort has succeeded in keeping the business stable.  He sells his goods in a part of the city where there are many passersby.  He’s requesting this loan to buy necklaces, bracelets, rings and earrings in order to earn higher income since this is a high season for tourism.  He figures that this loan will be of great help in that his inventory will grow so sales and income will too.  His future plan is to buy land to build his house.

loans.use: to buy necklaces, bracelets, earrings and rings.

loans.name: Maria Tomasa

texts.es:
María Tomasa
Doña Tomasa ha sido bien puntual y responsable, esta agradecida porque gracias a la ayuda de fape y kiva ha logrado sacar adelante a sus dos hijos, ya que su esposo la abandono y a pesar de eso ha sacado adelante a su familia. Desde hace más de 8 años ha administrado su propia tienda de consumo diario. Solicita el crédito para surtir más su tienda com productos de consumo diario y así incrementar sus ventas y ganancias, desde ya les agradese por su ayuda brindada que Dios los bendiga donde quiera que esten.
texts.en:
Doña María Tomasa has been punctual and responsible. She is grateful because, thanks to help from FAPE and Kiva she has been able to assist her two children to get ahead. Her husband abandoned her and despite that, she has succeeded in helping her family get ahead. 

For more than eight years she has run her own store selling daily consumption items. She is requesting a loan to add more inventory to her store, especially everyday necessities. Thus she will increase her sales and profits.  Again, she thanks you for the help you have provided her and may God bless you, wherever you are.

loans.use: to purchase groceries for daily consumption to re-sell.

loans.name: Francisco Reynaldo

texts.es:
Francisco de 35 años de edad, casado con dos hijos menores de edad, originario de Leon, lugar que está ubicado en la zona de occidente del país. Se caracteriza por ser trabajador, responsable con ganas de superación personal. Francisco lucha día a día para brindarles un futuro mejor a sus hijos, ya que el tuvo que trabajar desde temprana edad para ayudar con los gastos del hogar. Lamentablemente no pudo cursar una carrera y se vio obligada a trabajar desde temprana edad para ayudar con los gastos de hogar.

Gracia a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante tiene por actividad económica una pulpería, una pequeña tienda que vende productos comestibles en cantidades pequeñas como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, pan, detergente, jabón, jugos, tiste, verduras, fósforos. El dedica a su negocio unas 12 horas diarias ofreciendo sus productos. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de productos comestibles, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. Francisco agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan   a personas de escasos recursos y países  pobre como es  Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Francisco is 35 years old and is married with young children. He was born in Leon, which is located in the country's west. Francisco is hard working, responsible and has a desire for self-improvement. Francisco struggles each day to offer his children a better future, since unfortunately he himself was unable to study a degree because he had to work from an early age to help out with the household expenses. 

Thanks to his efforts and his desire to get ahead, he has put together a small grocery store where he sells products in small quantities like rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, detergent, soap, juice, drinking powder, vegetables and matches. He works in the store for 12 hours every day selling his products. The aim of this loan is to invest in working capital to re-stock his grocery store by buying and selling products so that in the not too distant future he can obtain a better income. 

Francisco is thankful for the help of all the Kiva lenders who offer people with scant resources in poor countries such as Nicaragua the means to earn a decent living.

loans.use: to invest in working capital to re-stock his grocery store by buying and selling products such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, detergent, soap, juice, drinking powder, vegetables and matches

loans.name: Ricardo Antonio

texts.es: Ricardo es un humilde  señor originario de la Ciudad de Granada. De 59 años de edad, soltero  y padre de 4 hijos. Es de oficio comerciante y se dedica a la venta de raspados. Inicio  esta actividad hace 19 años primeramente vendiendo Hot dog, luego con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo logro ahorrar, es así como se compró su carro vende raspados con el cual  hoy en día recorre las calles de la ciudad ofreciendo su producto. Solicita el crédito para comprar: azúcar, vasos, cucharas y dos llantas para su medio de transporte con el fin de satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Estima que este crédito será de mucha ayuda ya que aumentaran sus ventas y mejorara su calidad de vida.  Su meta próxima es mejorar su medio de transporte  para que los clientes lo vean atractivo.
texts.en:
Ricardo’s a humble man from the city of Granada.  He’s 59-years-old, single and father of four children.  He’s a merchant by profession.  He sells shaved ice.  He started this activity 19 years ago originally selling hot-dogs.  With much effort and work he succeeded in saving which is how he was able to buy his shaved ice cart that he uses today to sell shave ice throughout the city streets.  

He’s asking for this loan to buy sugar, glasses and two tires for his means of transportation in order to meet customer needs.  He figures that this loan will be of much help to him for his sales will increase and his quality of life will improve.  His next goal is to improve his means of transport so customers will find it attractive.

loans.use: to buy sugar, glasses, spoons and two tires.

loans.name: Ry's Group

texts.en:
Ry is originally from Battambang province’s Moung Russey district.  She is 44 years old and a breadwinner in her family, consisting of six children. Currently, four of her children are in school. 

To sustain her family, she grows rice on four hectares of farmland. She is able to earn about KHR 38,000 per day from the business that she has had for 10 years. 

This is the first microloan for Ry’s group with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She and her joint borrower are seeking KHR 1,000,000 each. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and to pay for transplanting.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and to pay for transplanting

loans.name: Dúo Victoria 3 Group

texts.es: Dúo Victoria 3 este grupo esta conformado por la señora victoria de de 37 años de edad, ella se a dedica a la elaboracion y venta de delantales y ropa tipica, en esta oportunidad ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la elaboracion de delantales ya que sus clientes le han pedido nuevos pedidos y nececita capital para invertir.
texts.en:
Victoria 3 Duo

Victoria, 37, is in this group.  She works making and selling aprons and traditional costumes.  On this occasion she’s asking for the loan to buy raw materials used to make aprons since her customers have placed new orders and she needs investment capital.

loans.use: to buy raw materials used to make aprons.

loans.name: Pedro Ernesto

texts.es:
Pedro es un hombre de 32 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Ica, el es muy trabajador, entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Pedro no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional.
Por iniciativa propia, Pedro trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de ropa, para damas y caballeros,el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Pedro se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada comprará mayor cantidad y variedad de prendas de vestir para su venta, así pues el seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Pedro is a 32 year old man. He is single and lives in the city of Ica. He is very hardworking and enthusiastic. He dedicates all his time to getting ahead. Unfortunately, due to a lack of resources and the need to work, he was not able to study for a professional career.

On his own initiative, Pedro started a small business selling clothing for ladies and gentlemen. He works every day for approximately 10 hours a day and believes he is doing well because of his dedication and sacrifice.

Pedro is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to their help, he will buy a greater quantity and variety of clothing items for re-sale. Thus, he will continue working and striving to attain his great dream, that of having his own home one day.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Dúo Unidos Por Gracia Group

texts.es: Dúo unidos por gracia este grupo esta conformado por la señora Emiliana de 47 años de edad ella se dedica a la elaboracion y venta de refacciones desde hace muchos años empeso a negocio cuando su esposos fallecio y gracias a Dios le a ido bien y a apoyado a su familia, ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de unsumos(productos comestibeles) para la elaboreacion de refacciones ya que dia con dia sus clientes la visitan y le piden diferentes clases de comida esperando que ustedes la sigan apoyando en su negocio
texts.en:
United By Grace Duo

Emiliana, 47, is in this group.  She has been working making and selling snacks for many years.  She started when her husband died and thanks to God she’s done well and has supported her family.  She’s asking for this loan to buy ingredients (food items) to make the various food items that her customers who visit her day to day request.  She hopes you will continue supporting her business.

loans.use: to buy food-making ingredients.

loans.name: Beatriz Del Socorro

texts.es: La joven Beatriz es originaria de la ciudad de Granada. De 23 años de edad y madre soltera de un hijo.  Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la elaboración de ropa (costura) y venta de productos varios.  Ella inicia esta actividad  hace 8 años junto a su mama quien fue la que le enseño desde temprana edad  a realizar costura y ganarse el dinero con mucho esfuerzo y sacrifico, es así como Beatriz hoy en día tiene un negocio rentable y de mucho beneficio para su familia, comercializa sus productos en casa. Solicita el crédito para comprar: Perfumes, cremas, maquillaje, tela, botones, hilo entre otros ya que en esta temporada hay más demanda del producto. Estima que este crédito le ayudara a aumentar sus ventas y tendrá  mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Beatriz is a young woman who was born in the city of Granada. She is 23 years old and a single mother to one son. She works as a shop keeper, sewing clothes and selling various products. She began this work eight years ago with her mother who was the one who taught her  from a young age how to sew and earn money with a lot of effort and sacrifice. Thanks to her, Beatriz now runs a profitable business from home which is of much benefit to her family.

Beatriz is applying for a loan to buy perfume, creams, make up, material, buttons, thread, and other items, since there is currently more demand for these products. She believes that this loan will help her to increase her sales and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy perfume, creams, make up, material, buttons, thread, and other items

loans.name: Dúo Lleno De Gracia 2 Group

texts.es: Dúo Lleno de gracia 2, este grupo esta conformado por la señora Maria Silvia de 34 años de edada ella se dedica a la venta de refacciones desde hace varios años, dia con dia lucha por sacar adelante a su familia y gracias a Dios que le a dado la vida para seguir luchando en esta oportunidad ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de insumos(productos comestibles)para la elaboracion de refacciones, esperando que ustedes la puedan seguir ayudando ya que anhelo de ella es poder tener un negocio mas grande para generar mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Full of Grace 2 Duo

María Silvia, 34, is in this group.  She has sold snacks for several years.  She strives daily to move her family forward and thanks God Who has given her life to continue striving.  On this occasion she’s asking for the loan to buy ingredients (food items) to make the snacks.  She hopes that you will continue helping since her wish is to be able to have a bigger business to generate higher profits.

loans.use: to buy food-preparation ingredients.

loans.name: Sokkea's Group

texts.en:
Sokkea is 52 years old and the mother of four children.  She is a villager from the Moung Russey district of Battambang province. 

She grows rice as her  main source of income. Additionally, she can earn additional income via her occupation as a school teacher.  She has been involved in her current business for 16 years, and she can generate about KHR 26,700 per day. This is a four-cycle loan for Sokkea with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has utilized her past loan wisely to uplift her living conditions better than before. 

Now, she has formed a group of two to get a new loan. As a leader, she will spend entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and insecticide for her crop. She hopes that she can gain a good yield with a good income better than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and insecticide for her crop

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: Maria es originaria de la ciudad de Granada,  Casada y madre de 3 hijos. Ella es una señora humilde, trabajadora y dedicada desde hace 20 años a la elaboración de cajeta de coco. Inicio desde pequeña a ejercer esta actividad, con mucho esfuerzo y con poco inventario logro elaborar cajetas y venderlas rápido, esto la motivo a seguir con esta actividad la cual hoy en día es rentable, comercializa su producto de manera ambulante. Cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo e hijos quienes le ayudan a la elaboración y venta. Solicita el crédito para comprar: Azúcar, coco, bolsas, entre otros con el fin de aumentar sus ventas y abastecer a sus clientes. Estima que el crédito será de mucha ayuda ya que obtendrá mayores ganancias y mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María is from the city of Granada.  She’s married and mother of three children.  She’s a humble, hardworking woman who for the last 20 years has been making coconut candy.  She started doing this as a girl and with much effort and little inventory succeeded in making it and selling it quickly.  This motivated her to continue with this activity which at present is profitable.  She sells her product from place to place and her husband and children help her make and sell it.

She’s asking for the loan to buy sugar, coconut and bags, among other things aiming at increasing sales and supplying her customers.  She figures that the loan will be of great help to her because she’ll earn higher profits and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sugar, coconut, bags, etc.

loans.name: Lisstte

texts.es: Lissette tiene 26 años,  vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa y esta muy agradecida con el apoyo que le están brindando los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo podrá mercadería para su negocio de venta de calzado,  con lo cual podrá mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su sueño de Tener una boutique”
texts.en: Lissette, 26, lives in the city of Pucallpa and is very grateful for the support she’s getting from Kiva lenders because thanks to their support she’ll be able to buy merchandise for her shoe selling business which will improve her income and she will be able to continue striving to make her dream reality: to own a boutique.

loans.use: to buy shoes.

loans.name: Phy's Group

texts.en:
Age 52 and a citizen originally from Battambang province, Phy is married and has five children. For her family, three hectares of rice cropping is the main source of income, which has returned her almost 33,000 KHR (Cambodian Riels).  

This is the second loan for Phy and the fourth loan for her co-borrower in a group of two. The positive impact of her loan has enabled her to improve her living at a gradual pace. 

For this cycle, she is seeking 600,000 KHR, whereas her joint borrower is applying for 500,000 KHR. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and insecticide, and to pay for the plowing fee for her crop. She hopes that she can gain a good yield with a double income to better her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and insecticide, and to pay for the plowing fee for her crop.

loans.name: Wendy De Los Angeles

texts.es: Wendy es originaria de la ciudad de Granada. De 22 años de edad y soltera. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de comidas rápidas (Hot dog y Hamburguesas) y batidos. Ella inicio su negocio hace cuatro años con poco inventario, luego con mucho sacrificio y esfuerzo fue aumentando su producción debido a la demanda de sus clientes, comercializa sus productos en su casa ya que es un lugar transitado por turistas. Cuenta con el apoyo de su mama y hermanos quienes les ayudan en su negocio y que además son su ejemplo a seguir. Solicita este crédito para comprar: lechuga, tomate, salchichón, jamón, cebolla, salsa, pan, entre otros con el fin de abastecer a sus clientes. Estima que el crédito será de mucha ayuda ya que aumentara sus ventas  e ingresos. Su plan futuro es  establecer una cafetería.
texts.en:
Wendy’s from the city of Granada.  She’s 22-years-old and single.  She’s a merchant by profession.  She sells fast-food (hot-dogs and hamburgers) and fruit blended drinks.  She started her business four years ago with little inventory but with much effort and sacrifice gradually increased production over time thanks to customer demand.  She sells her products at home for it’s a very visited spot by tourists.  Her mother and siblings help her in the business plus they set a good example to follow.

She’s asking for this loan to buy lettuce, tomato, sausage, ham, onions, sauce and bread, among others in order to supply her customers.  She figures that the loan will be of much help to her for sales and income will increase.  Her future plan is to open a snack bar.

loans.use: to buy lettuce, tomato, sausage, ham, onion, sauce, bread, etc.

loans.name: Chhoeurn's Group

texts.en:
Chhoeurn is 54 years old and a resident of the Thmor Koul district of Battambang province. She is the mother of four children. 

For the sake of her family, she does rice farming on two hectares of farmland as her main source of income. It is a business that she has had for 10 years. 

New to VisionFund (Kiva’s partner), she leads a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer for her crop. 

She hopes to gain a triple yield from her crop so she can double her income.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her crop

loans.name: Chreb's Group

texts.en:
Chreb is 32 years old and a married mother blessed with five children. She is a rice grower on four hectares of farmland, which she has occupied for 13 years. It has returned her about 43,300 KHR (Cambodian Riels) per day. 

This is the first-time loan for Chreb and her co-borrower in a group of two with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She is seeking 1,000,000 KHR, whereas her joint borrower is applying for 500,000 KHR. As the leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer, insecticide, and gasoline for her hand-tractor. She hopes to gain a good income from her crop and make a double income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticide, and gasoline for her hand-tractor.

loans.name: Sophy's Group

texts.en:
Sophy is 36 years old and has two children who are in school. Her primary sources of income are from handmade flat baskets made from bamboo, and rice farming. The business that she has had for 16 years has returned her about 40,000 KHR (Cambodian Riels) per day. 

Including this loan, she is a second-time borrower with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has fully repaid her past loan wisely to stablize her living condition and keep her kids in school. 

For this new cycle, she leads a group of four to get a new loan. As the leader, she will spend her loan portion to buy bamboo to produce more flat baskets and to buy fertilizer and insecticide for her crop. She hopes to gain a good income from her business, better than before.

loans.use: to buy bamboo to produce more flat baskets and to buy fertilizer and insecticide for her crop.

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Mongkul Borey District

loans.name: Sambo

texts.en:
Sambo is 47 years old and the father of four children.  He is a resident of the Oh Chrov district of Banteay Meanchey. 

He grows rice as his main source of income, which it has been for about 10 years. This is his first microloan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). 

With this loan, he will spend the entire loan to pay tuition for his son. He hopes that he can support his son’s education now so that his son can obtain a good job after graduation to support the family.

loans.use: To pay tuition for his son

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Ou Chrov Dristrict

loans.name: Cintya Betzabe

texts.es:
Cintya es una mujer de 21 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con sus padres y hermanos, ella es muy trabajadora, entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Cintya pudo estudiar la carrera técnica de Contabilidad.
Por iniciativa propia, Cintya trabaja como auxiliar en una empresa de su ciudad, ella trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y buen desempeño.
Cintya se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada realizara el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que desea tarrajear y pintar la sala de su hogar, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño ser una buena profesional.
texts.en:
Cintya, 21, is a single woman living with her parents and siblings in the city of Nazca.  She’s very hardworking and enthusiastic with a strong self-improvement drive.  Thanks to her effort and to her parents’ support, Cintya was able to study the technical Accounting career.

On her own initiative she works as an aide for a firm in the city.  She works every day for about 10 hours and believes she does well because of her dedication and the good way she does her work.

Cintya is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided she will make some home improvements.  She wants to seal the walls and paint the living room at home.  She will continue then working and striving to reach her great dream: to become a good professional.

loans.use: to make home improvements.

loans.name: Mirtha Janet

texts.es: Mirtha tiene 52 años de edad, y está muy agradecida por la ayuda que le están brindando, ya que gracias a ello podrá comprar materiales de construcción para poder colocar un falso piso en su vivienda, ya que actualmente es de tierra; de esta manera podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su gran sueño:”Darle una profesión a sus menores hijos”.
texts.en: Mirtha, 52, is very grateful for the help she’s being given because thanks to it she’ll be able to buy building supplies to install a raised floor at home since her current floor is dirt.  In this way she’ll be able to improve her quality of life and continue striving to make her great dream reality: to provide her younger children with professions.

loans.use: to lay a floor at home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the tuition fee of her son.

loans.name: Carlos Andrés

texts.es: Carlos es un campesino de 30 años de edad que, durante su vida productiva se ha dedicado a trabajar como empleado en un cultivo de flores en una finca de la región donde reside, allí labora todos los días de 6:00 am a 2:00 pm; adicionalmente alterna su trabajo, cuidando su propio cultivo de hortensias, el cual posee hace aproximadamente 2 años y con el que complementa los ingresos para llevar el sustento a su familia y a su pequeño hijo de 1 año de edad. Su empuje, perseverancia y las ganas de salir adelante, lo impulsan para buscar alternativas que apoyen su proceso de crecimiento, por esta razón solicita el crédito, con el cual pagará una deuda a sus proveedores y cancelar el saldo de un crédito que tiene vigente; esto le permitirá tener capital disponible para enfrentar su principal desafío que es el manejo de cartera, pues sus clientes pagan a 3 meses, pero los gastos de su microempresa no dan espera, llegan cada mes, afectando la rentabilidad de su negocio. Carlos desea seguir luchando para sacar adelante nuevamente su labor y así poder acceder a la posibilidad de ampliar sus cultivos, adquirir más clientes y brindar oportunidades de empleo; de esta manera podrá tener más rentabilidad y además generará mayores ingresos para garantizar a su familia un mejor bienestar y calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carlos, 30, has spent part of his productive life working as an employee on a flower farm in the region where he lives; he works there every day from 6am until 2pm.  In addition, he also cares for his own hortense flower crop that he’s had for about two years and that produces extra income for him to support his family and one-year-old son.

His drive, perseverance and wish to succeed impel him to seek alternatives that will support his growth process and this is why he’s asking for the loan that he’ll use to pay off a debt he has with suppliers and to pay off another pending loan.  This will make it possible for him to have cash on hand to face his main challenge which is managing his client portfolio because they pay him every three months but his micro-business has expenses that don’t wait, they arrive monthly affecting his business’ bottom line.

Carlos wants to continue striving to move his work forward once more and be able to access the possibility of expanding his crops, acquiring more customers and offering employment opportunities.  In this way, he’ll be more profitable and generate higher income to ensure his family’s improved well-being and quality of life.

loans.use: to pay off debts.

loans.name: Duo Lleno De Gracia 3 Group

texts.es: Dúo Lleno de gracia 3 este grupo esta conformado por la señora Angelica de 48 años de edad ella se ha dedicado a la venta de productos de consumo diario(frijol,arroz,maiz,aceite,etc)desde hace 14 años ella tiene el punto de venta en la comunidad donde vive, ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mas mercaderia en productos de consumo diario, para surtir un poco mas su negocio esperando que ustedes le puedan saguir ayudando con creditos para que siga creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
Full of Grace 3 Duo

Angélica, 48, is in this group.  She has been selling basic daily consumption goods (beans, rice, corn, oil, etc.) for 14 years.  She has a sales point in the community where she lives.  She’s asking for this loan to buy more daily consumption merchandise to better stock her business hoping that you will be able to continue helping her with loans so she can continue growing in business.

loans.use: to buy food items to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies to repair the showers.

loans.name: La Nueva Esperanza De Corcona Group

texts.es: Los socios y socias del grupo “LA NUEVA ESPERANZA DE CORCONA “se encuentran muy contentos por estar pasando 06 ciclo. Carmen tiene 33 años es soltera con 02 hijos educando. Hace 3 años implemento su bodega en su vivienda en donde ofrece productos de primera necesidad. Es de esta manera que puede ser madre y padre de sus 02 hijos. El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de menestras y productos lácteos. Su mayor deseo es tener un bazar. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo brindado. Carmen es la primera del lado izquierdo es la que tiene a su hija en brazos. Y de la misma manera se encuentra incluida la foto de Victoria en la parte superior derecha que no pudo estar presente en la reunión grupal.
texts.en:
The members of the La Nueva Esperanza de Corcona [The New Hope of Corcona] group are very happy to be participating in their sixth loan cycle.

Group member Carmen is 33 years old, and is a single mother bringing up two children. Three years ago she set up a grocery store in her home, selling basic necessities. In this way she is able to be a mother and father to her children. She will invest her part of the loan in vegetable soups and dairy products to sell. Her greatest dream is one day to have a stationery store.

The group expresses its thanks to Kiva investors for providing the loan. Carmen is pictured first on the left, with her daughter in her arms. Hilda Victoria is shown in the insert at the top right of the photo as she was not able to attend the group meeting.

loans.use: to buy vegetable soups and dairy products.

loans.name: Mirna Morelia

texts.es:
Mirna de 57 de años, estudio noveno grado, ella es viuda desde hace 9 años, en la casa están 5 hijos y dos de ellos que son gemelos están estudiando. 

Mirna posee un molino, que lo pone a funcionar dos veces al día, una en la mañana y otra en la tarde, ya que son las horas que las personas del cantón muelen, lo tiene desde hace 8 años esto lo decidió a un año después de la muerte del esposo; ya que vio que era necesario una fuente de ingreso para sacar adelante a los hijos también tiene unas vacas de donde vende la leche y los quesos que saca de eso, para este negocio los hijos se les involucran y le ayudan.

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar  y vender ganado; ya que el hijo maneja un camión que lleva el ganado al comercio y ve que el negocio es bueno,  ha decidido comprar más ganado y cuando la plaza esta buena poder venderlas y tener buena ganancia y que los hijos trabajen y aprendan este negocio y que les sirva en un futuro. 

Su deseo, es que los hijos aprendan este trabajo y les sirva para toda la vida y cuando ellos decidan hacer su vida con una pareja no sufran y tengan como defenderse y con las ganancias  aumentar el negocio y tener más ganado y vender más leche y más queso que son cosas que las personas buscan mas
texts.en:
Mirna, 57, completed ninth grade.  She’s been widowed for the last nine years.  She has five children at home and two of them who are twins attend school.

Mirna owns a mill that she puts into operation twice a day, once in the morning and then again in the afternoon which are the times when people in the canton grind.  She’s had it for 8 years and started it a year after her husband’s death because she realized that she needed a source of income to support her children.  She also owns a few cows and she sells the milk and cheese she gets from them.  Her children participate and help her with this business.

The loan she’s requesting is to buy and sell cattle since her son drives a truck that takes cattle to market and she sees that this is a good business.  She’s decided to buy more cattle to sell when the market’s good to earn high profits and so her children can work and learn this business that will be of use to them in the future.

Her wish is to see that her children learn this work that will serve them their entire lives so that when they decide to make their own lives with a partner they won’t suffer and will have a way to defend themselves and use profits to expand the business and have still more cattle and sell more milk and cheese which are the things people seek the most.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es: Doña Rosa es originaria de la ciudad de Masaya, pero actualmente vive en Granada. Es de oficio comerciante y se dedica a la venta de raspado desde hace más de 20 años. Esta agradecida con Kiva y MiCredito por otorgarle el crédito anterior, este le ayudo a mejorar su calidad de vida. Solicito es crédito anterior para comprar azúcar, vasos, leche condensada entre otros. Solicita este nuevo crédito para comprar: frutas, azúcar, hielo, vasos y cucharas con el fin de satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Estima que el crédito será de mucha ayuda ya que obtendrá mayores ventas e ingresos.
texts.en:
Rosa is originally from the city of Masaya, but she currently lives in Granada. She is a merchant by profession and she has made a living selling shaved-ice drinks for over 20 years. 

She is thankful to Kiva and MiCredito for granting her her previous loan, which helped her to improve her quality of life. She requested the prior loan to buy sugar, cups, condensed milk and other things. 

She is requesting this new loan to buy fruit, sugar, ice, cups and spoons, in order to satisfy the needs of her clients. She thinks the loan will be very helpful to her since she will make more sales and income.

loans.use: to buy fruit, sugar, ice, cups, and spoons

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es:
Alfredo de 49 años, desde muy pequeño sea dedicado a los trabajos de agricultura y albañilería, de donde hoy en día tiene a 4 hijos estudiando en grados diferentes, como bachillerato general, noveno, sétimo grado y quinto son los grados que sus hijos están estudiando. Los otros hijos ya están mayores, pero continúan viviendo en la misma casa del cliente. Uno de ellos se dedica a la agricultura y otras actividades. Su esposa solo se dedica a los oficios domésticos y son una familia muy unida, porque todos aportan para la alimentación en  la casa y también para cubrir otros gastos familiares.

Él es albañil de profesión, es una persona que tiene alrededor de 20 años de dedicarse a esta actividad, con la cual ha sacado a delante a toda su familia; una de las cosas que lo motivo en este trabajo fue que cuando pequeño su papá lo andaba llevando, en los trabajos que él realizaba y era lo de albañil, por eso aprendió rápidamente y en el camino, fue viendo que era una actividad donde sí se ganaba dinero y es así como se decidió en aprender bien al grado, que hoy es uno de los mejores en la zona donde vive. 

Siempre también sea dedicado a los trabajos de agricultura, porque también han sido una fuente de ingreso que ha tenido, hace mucho tiempo también tenía 20 vacas, de las cuales obtenía ingresos para su familia, pero por problemas se tuvo que deshacer de ellas. En la actividad que realiza como albañil involucra a sus hijos, los cuales están aprendiendo de la actividad que el realiza.

El dinero será invertido, para la compra de ganado lechero, específicamente comprara una vaca lechera, para iniciar con la producción que antes tenía. Con esto podrá, obtener una fuente de ingreso más para su familia y con ello mejorar las condiciones de vida de sus hijos, que están en un proceso de estudio. Una de las necesidades, era eso tener animales para aprovechar el pasto que se tiene en los terrenos.

En un futuro, piensa tener unas 10 vacas productoras de leche, y con ello tener ingresos extras en su casa. Para eso ya dio el primer paso, que es comprar la primera, ya tiene los comederos y solo espera que su trabajo sea productivo y pueda obtener buenos resultados, y que sus hijos puedan tener buenas condiciones de vida, que espera se superen y logren muchas cosas en su vida.
texts.en:
Alfredo, 49, has been working in agriculture and doing masonry work ever since he was very young.  He currently has 4 children attending school in different grades, including high school, 9th grade, 7th grade, and 5th grade.  His other children are already grown, but they continue to live in his house.  One of them works as a farmer and has other economic activities.  Alfredo's wife devotes herself to the household chores.  They are a very united family, because each of them contributes to put food on the table and cover other family expenses.  

Alfredo is a mason by profession; he has about 20 years of experience in this activity, and this is how he provides for his family.  One of the things that motivated him in this work was that as a child his dad, who was a mason, would take him to work, and so he learned the trade rapidly and on the job. He was seeing that this was an activity where one could earn money, and so decided to learn this trade very well so that now he is one of the best in the area where he lives.  In addition, he has also always worked in agriculture, because this has been another source of income for him.  For a long time he had 20 cows, from which he obtained income for his family, but because of some problems he had to get rid of them.  Alfredo has involved his children in his masonry work; they are learning how to do the same work that he does.

Alfredo will use this loan to buy dairy cows, specifically, he will buy one dairy cow to start producing as he did before.  With this, he will be able to obtain another source of income for his family, and thereby improve his children's living conditions as they get an education.  He needs to have animals to take advantage of the pasture grass that he has on his lands.  In the future, he plans to have 10 milk cows so that he can have extra income in the household.  To do this, he is taking the first step, which is to buy the first cow.  He already has feeding troughs, and he is hoping that his work will be productive and that he will get good results so that his children can have better living conditions and can succeed and achieve lots of things in their lives.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is married, with five chldren living along with her in Clarin, Misamis Occidental. 

She has had a rice field that is the family's main source of income. In 2007, she joined GDMPC, and her previous loan was successfully repaid. 

She has also engaged recently in selling cosmetics products, like cologne, lotion, and shampoo. She plans to improve this business to earn more customers, so she has borrowed a new loan from GDMPC that she plans to use to purchase more beauty products to resell. 

She wants to improve her family's living and to buy another rice field in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more beauty products to resell

loans.name: Elvira Salome

texts.es: La Sra. Elvira Salome tiene 42 años y es Casada,  estudia la carrera  Licenciatura,  trabaja para pagar sus estudios ya que el sueldo del esposo que trabaja como cobrador de una  empresa lo utiliza solo en los gastos de la casa, la Sra. Elvira estudia en una Universidad de la ciudad de La Paz, este  es su primer crédito con la institución,  la Sra. Elvira va a usar este préstamo para  distintos gastos  que implica el estudiar cómo Financiar la Matriculación y titulación de la carrera que está estudiando para terminar sus estudios que durara el tiempo 5 Años. la Sra. Elvira enfrenta retos en su estudios que son La falta de un ingreso por parte de ella, ya que actualmente depende del esposo para todo,  viven en la zona  Miraflores su deseo cuando termine sus estudios es Quiere terminar su profesión, mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Elvira Salome is 42 years old and married.  She is studying for her undergraduate degree.  She works to pay for her studies as her husband's job, as a bus conductor, covers only the household costs.  Elvira is studying at a university in La Paz.  This is her first loan with the institution and she will use it to cover various costs associated with her studies, such as matriculation fees and paying for her degree title.  This will allow her to complete her five-year-long study programme.  Elvira faces challenges in her studies, such as not having her own income.  She is currently relying on her husband for everything.  Elvira and her husband live in the Miraflores area.  Elvira's wish, when she finishes her studies, is to become a professional and improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to pay matiruclation fees.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
Julio es un hombre de 42 años, vive en la ciudad de Huaraz, en el distrito de Carhuaz con su hija, el es muy trabajador, entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, Julio trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de artículos para el hogar, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Julio se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada comprará mayor cantidad y variedad de mercadería para su negocio, tales como edredones, utensilios de cocina, escobas y otros, así pues el seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ver a su hija convertida en una buena profesional.
texts.en:
Julio is a 42-year-old man who lives with his daughter in the city of Huaraz, in the Carhuaz district. He is very hard-working and enthusiastic, and he dedicates all his efforts to getting his family ahead. On his own initiative, Julio works in his own small business selling household items. He works every day for approximately 10 hours and he thinks it is going well for him due to his dedication and effort.

Julio is very thankful to the Kiva lenders since, thanks to the help they have offered him, he will be able to buy a greater quantity and variety of merchandise for his business, such as comforters, kitchen utensils, brooms, and more. He will continue working and striving to achieve his greatest dream, which is to see his daughter become a good professional.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Dúo La Esmeralda Group

texts.es: Dúo Las Esmeraldas representado por doña Eva judith de 50 años, viuda tiene una hijo,  doña Eva tiene una librería, donde tiene variedad de productos, está ubicada justo  al lado de la escuela, y eso le ayuda a que venda mucho más que cualquier otra librería, doña Eva también hace manualidades y vende piñatas desde hace 35 años,en esta oportunidad esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mars mercaderia para en papeles y mercaderia para su negocio de libreria
texts.en: The "Las Esmeraldas" duo has two members, one of whom is 50-year-old Eva Judith.  She is a widow, and has one son.  Eva has a bookshop, where she sells a variety of products.  The shop is just beside a school and this helps her to sell much more than just any bookstore.  Eva has also been doing handicrafts and selling piñatas for 35 years.  On this occasion Elvira is applying for a loan in order to buy more merchandise for her bookshop.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for a bookshop.

loans.name: Luisa Marisol

texts.es:
Luisa tiene 4ª años, trabaja en un centro de análisis médicos y cada día se esfuerza mucho para poder salir adelante a pesar de las adversidades, Luisa cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy responsable.

Luisa esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva yaque gracias a a ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá compara una refrigeradora para su hogar y de esta maneta mejorar su calidad de vida y seguir esforzándose por hacer realidad su sueño:” Tener su propio centro de análisis médico”.
texts.en:
Luisa is four years old and works in a medical test centre (where patients go for blood tests and the like).  Every day she puts in the effort to get ahead, in spite of adversities.  Luisa believes her work is going well because she is very responsible.

Luis is very grateful to Kiva investors as, thanks to this support, she will be able to buy a fridge for her home.  This will improve her quality of life and she will continue working to achieve her dream: "To have my own medical test centre".

loans.use: to buy a fridge.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizer

loans.name: Alex

texts.es: El Sr. Alex sigue con la misma actividad de la construcción de muebles y puertas,  en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de herramientas para realizar su trabajo, Cuenta que le fue bien con el anterior crédito ya que lo utilizo en compra de madera para realizar su trabajo, se siente agradecido con los prestamistas de Kiva por el apoyo brindado ya que este prestamos le ayuda a mejora su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Alex is continuing with the same business of building furniture and doors. On this occasion he is requesting the loan so that he can buy tools for carrying out his work. 

He says that it went well with the previous loan, as he used it to buy wood for doing his work. 

He is grateful to the Kiva lenders for the support offered, as this loan helps him to improve his business and therefore his quality of life.

loans.use: To buy tools.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.en: Nilda runs a general store in Clarin, Misamis Occidental where her family lives. She has been in this business for  a long time in order to earn a living. She plans to purchase dried fish in addition to groceries, so she borrowed a loan from Kiva partner GDMPC micro credit. She is hopeful to sustain the business and able to expand for the future needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase dried fish in addition to groceries

loans.name: Klein

texts.en: Klein is married and resides in Clarin, Misamis Occidental.  He runs a transportation service to earn a living. His wife is a government employee and in addition to their income, he carries passengers and baggage in order to earn an income. He joined Kiva partner GDMPC in 2012 and now has borrowed a loan to renew licenses and motor registration and cover the costs for repairs. He plans to save his profits to build their own house.

loans.use: to renew licenses and motor registration and cover the costs for repairs.

loans.name: Adolfa

texts.en: Adolfa is 49, and from Malaubang, Ozamiz City and  is married with six children. For the last 25 years she has run a general store, selling a variety of food and home use products in the local community.  She earns 3,000 PHP a month for these activities.  Her previous loan from Kiva partner GDMPC that was used in her business was successfully repaid. Recently, she borrowed a loan to purchase additional groceries to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan to save as a reserve for future emergencies and she wants to buy a motorcycle to be used for the business.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery goods to sell.

loans.name: Las Orquideas Group

texts.es: El Banco de Emprendimiento LAS ORQUIDEAS está compuesto por ocho integrantes seis mujeres y dos varones que se dedican a distintas actividades, la presidenta del banco es la Sra. Ana tiene 63 años, ella se dedica al comercio minorista, ofreciendo variedad de productos desde cosas de cocina como variedad de productos según la temporada pero solo de plástico, visitando y entregando a su mercadería puestos de venta y domicilios, ya que entrega sus productos a crédito, la Sra. Ana vive en su domicilio que  se encuentra en la zona de Tembladerani de la Ciudad de La Paz,   este préstamo es su   primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Ana va a usar este préstamo para la compra de mercadería,  ya que tiene muchos pedidos y así de esta  manera incrementar su capital de trabajo,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es compra de mercadería, la la Sra. Ana enfrenta retos en su negocio que es la demanda que hay de nuevos productos y va a utilizar los beneficios en una mejor atención con la compra de variedad de producto,  la Sra. Ana se siente feliz y agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado en la otorgación del crédito.
texts.en:
The communal bank LAS ORQUIDEAS (The Orchids) is made up of eight members: six women and two men, who make their livings in different areas. The president of the bank is Ana, who is 63. She makes a living in the retail business, offering a variety of products from kitchen items to products that vary according to season - but only plastic items. 

She delivers her merchandise by visiting sales stalls and residences, since she sells her products on credit. Ana lives in a home in the Tembladerani zone of the city of La Paz. This is her first loan cycle with this institution. Ana will use this loan to purchase merchandise, since she has many orders, and in this way she can increase her working capital. 

The reason she is requesting this loan is to purchase merchandise. Ana faces challenges in her business, such as the demand for new products, and she is going to use the profits to provide better customer service by buying varied products.  Ana feels happy and grateful to the institution for the support it has offered her by granting her this loan.

loans.use: to buy wholesale merchandise

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is married with one child and he lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental with his family. For more than three years, he has managed a banana farm in order to make a living. His previous loan from Kiva partner GDMPC that was used in his fishing business was successfully repaid.  As he was engaged in another line of business, he has borrowed a new loan in order to buy organic fertilizer for his banana farm. He is hopeful to improve his farm in order to use its profits to improve the house for the family.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer for his banana farm.

loans.name: Shirley

texts.es:
La familia de Shirley está integrada por sus padres, 3 hermanos y por ella, vive en un ambiente de amor, respeto, honestidad por sobre todas las cosas. Es por eso que sigue la carrera de obstetricia, una carrera que le gusta, y al terminarla podrá ayudar  también a su familia.
Su mayor es ser una excelente profesional que pueda ayudar a los demás, en algo tan importante como es la salud.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en el pago de sus cuotas y así seguir con su meta a cumplir.
texts.en:
Shirley’s family is made up of her parents, three siblings, and her.  She lives in a loving atmosphere, full of respect and honesty above all.  This is the reason she is pursuing a career as an obstetrician; a career that she enjoys.  Once she is fully qualified, she will be able to help her family as well.

Her greatest desire is to become an excellent professional who will be able to help others with something as important as their health.

She is asking for this loan to be able to pay her fees and continue toward completing her goal.

loans.use: to pay university expenses.

loans.name: Nicolasita

texts.en: Nicolasita is widowed and has five children and lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental. Nicolasita owns and operates a farm, planting and harvesting rice for sale and she has been in this business for six years.  Nicolasita joined Kiva partner GDMPC in 2012 and her previous loan that she used for her farm was successfully repaid. She has borrowed a new loan in order  to purchase fertilizer and organic pesticides . In the future, Nicolasita wants  to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and organic pesticides.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa se dedica al diseño de interiores, además del dibujo artístico , necesita comprar materiales de calidad como pinturas , pinceles , lienzos, brochas, etc, sus productos los vende en los locales dedicados a la venta de estos artículos y a personas de su comunidad. Por medio de esta actividad obtiene los ingresos que le permite hacer frente a los gastos de su hogar.Su solicitud de crédito es por ochocientos cuarenta mil colones (¢840.000), Ella agradece el apoyo comunal con el cual logra llevar a cabo su proyecto.
texts.en: Rosa is an interior designer and artist (drawing).  She needs to buy quality supplies such as paints, pencils, canvas, brushes, etc.  She sells her products in dedicated shops and to people in her community.  By doing this she earns money to pay her household expenses.  She is asking for a loan of 840,000 Colones and she’s grateful for the group support that will allow her to make this plan happen.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Las Pilas Catarina Group

texts.es:
La señora Amilca Elida es casada. de 48 años de edad. Curso 2 años de educación primaria. Tiene 4 hijos y de ellos 2 estan estudiando. Ella se dedica a la venta de Cocos en el mercado. Inició este negocio con un pequeño capital y al momento lleva 18 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para ampliar su capital de trabajo comprando mas cocos para la venta. Desea en el futuro tener un puesto fijo en el mercado de su localidad.

Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican al comercio y agricultura.
texts.en:
Amilca Elida is 48 years old, married, and has a second grade education.  She has four children and two of them attend school.  She sells coconuts in the market and started this business with a little capital and has been doing this for 18 years.

She joined this group and is asking for a loan that she will use to buy coconuts.  In the future she wants to have a fixed location in her local market.

The other ladies in the group are merchants and farmers.

loans.use: to buy coconuts.

loans.name: Elmer Modesto

texts.es: Don Elmer tiene 34 años de edad, originario de la ciudad de Estelí,  casado y padre de un hijo. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica  a la venta de ropa y cosméticos. Inicio su actividad con poco inventario de manera ambulante en la zona norte del país, Poco a poco fue logrando mejores ventas y  así es como este señor  humilde y dedicado ha logrado salir a delante. Hoy en día cuenta con un medio de transporte propio con el cual comercializa sus productos a diferentes puntos del país. Solicita este crédito para comprar: ropa, calzado, cosméticos, zapatos, juguetes, entre otros con el fin de tener más variedad de productos que le pueda ofrecer a sus clientes. Estima que el crédito será de mucha ayuda ya que lograra aumentar sus ventas e ingresos y tener mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Elmer is 34 years old and is from the city of Esteli.  He’s married, has a son and is a merchant who sells clothing and cosmetics.  He started his business with a small amount of inventory, selling on foot in the northern part of the country.  Little by little he began increasing his sales and this is how this dedicated humble gentleman was able to get ahead.  Today he has his own means of transportation with which he sells his products in different parts of the country.  He is asking for this loan to buy clothing, shoes, cosmetics, toys, and other things so that he will have a greater variety of products to offer his customers.  He estimates that this loan will be of great help, that he will be able to increase his sales and income, and have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Jader Antonio

texts.es: Jader es un joven de 20 años de edad, originario de la ciudad de Estelí, casado.  Es de oficio comerciante y se dedica a la venta de ropa usada. Inicio esta actividad hace dos años, con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio logro establecer una tienda de ropa donde sus precios son favorables y a medida de esto posee mucha clientela. Cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien le ayuda a administrar el negocio. Su meta próxima es comprar ropa de segunda mano y nueva. Solicita el crédito  para comprar una paca de ropa con el fin de ofrecer variedad a sus clientes y satisfacer sus necesidades. Estima que al obtener este crédito aumentara sus ventas e ingresos. Su plan futuro es establecer otra tienda en otro punto de la ciudad.
texts.en: Jader is a 20 year old married young man from Esteli.  He is a merchant who sells used clothing and started this business two years ago.  With great effort was able to set up a store where his prices are favorable so he has many customers.  He has his wife’s support and she helps manage the business.  His next goal is to buy new and second hand clothing and is asking for this loan to buy a pack of clothes so he can offer a variety of items to his customers to satisfy their needs.  He estimates that this loan will increase his sales and income.  His plans for the future are to set up another store in another part of the city.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Sarorn

texts.en:
Sarom is 53 years old and widowed, with two children. She lives in a rural village of the Kandal province’s Sa Ang district.

She earns a living through farming rice and also working as a garment worker in the local area. Together, she can earn about US$7 per day from her current business and can save about US$2 each day for future needs.

This is Sarorn’s first microloan with VisionFund. She is applying for a loan to buy a decent motorbike for commuting to work and also to use a portion to spend on buying school materials for her children. 

She hopes to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy a decent motorbike for commuting to work

loans.name: Felix Antonio

texts.es: Felix es un señor de 41 años de edad, originario de la ciudad de Estelí, casado y padre ejemplar de un hijo.  Es de oficio comerciante, dedicado a la venta de comida. Inicio este negocio hace 26 años, con mucho empeño logro ajustarse a la demanda de sus clientes. Su esposa lo apoya día a día  para salir adelante en este arduo negocio. Su meta próxima es contratar trabajadores para comercializar su producto en otro punto de la ciudad. Solicita el crédito para comprar productos básicos para su venta de comida tales como: aceite, tortillas, arroz, carne entre otros con el fin de elevar sus ventas y satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Estima que el crédito le ayudara aumentar sus ingresos y tener una mejor comodidad en su vivienda. Sus planes futuros es fortalecer más su negocio.
texts.en: Felix is 41 years old and originally from Esteli.  He’s married, is the exemplary father of one son, and works as a merchant.  He began this business 26 years ago and was able to adjust to his customers’ needs with lots of effort.  His wife helps him daily to get ahead in this arduous business.  His next goal is to hire employees to sell his products from a different location in town.  He is asking for this loan to buy basic food products such as cooking oil, tortillas, meat, and other things in order to increase his sales and satisfy his customer demand.  He estimates that this loan will help increase his income and make it possible for him to have a more comfortable home.  His future plans are to strengthen his business.

loans.use: to stock his store.

loans.name: Dúo Eb Dios Confiamos Group

texts.es:
Dúo en Dios Confiamos

Dúo conformado por Mayra Del Rosario,ella es originaria de san Martin Jilotepeque Rosa se dedica a la crianza de pollos,tiene varios años de dedicarse a esta actividad y esta solicitando este credito para la compra de animales para la crianza ya que quiere invertir ahora para cuando venga la epoca de fin de año ya esten grandes para vender, espera que kiva le pueda ayudar para seguir creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
"En Dios Confiamos" Group

The group is made up of Mayra Del Rosario and Rosa. Rosa is from San Martin Jilotepeque. She raises chickens, and has been doing this work for several years. 

She is requesting this loan to buy animals to raise. She wants to invest now, so that by the time the year-end season comes, they will be large enough to sell.  She hopes that Kiva can help her, so that she can continue growing in her business.

loans.use: To buy animals (chickens) to raise.

loans.name: Mabel

texts.es:
Mabel es una persona sacrificada que proviene de una familia, quien se esfuerza por poder salir adelante, y agradece por estar teniendo la posibilidad de obtener esta oportunidad y poder sobresalir, así en algún tiempo aspirar algo bueno provechoso para mi mejor nivel de vida.
Ella está estudiando la carrera de contabilidad, y quiere ayudar a su familia por medio de su trabajo y así ir sobresaliendo. Ella tiene como meta poder ayudar a su familia y retribuirles todo lo que le dieron.
Ella solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en el pago de su título, ya que tiene muchos gastos.
texts.en:
Mabel is a hardworking person who comes from a family that puts forth a great effort to get ahead, and she is grateful for the possibility of being able to succeed.  This way, she will eventually be able to achieve something that will help improve her quality of life.

She is studying to become an accountant and wants to help her family through her work and succeed in this way.  Her goal is to be able to help her family and repay them for all they have done.

She is asking for this loan so she can pay for her title.  She already has many other expenses.

loans.use: to pay for her title.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.es:
Maricel es de la ciudad de Paraguarí, su meta es ser una excelente analista de sistema, para poder ayudar a las personas que necesiten de su servicio.
Ella está luchando por salir adelante y poder retribuir a su familia todo lo que la ayudaron.
Hoy solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en el pago de su tesis, ya que tiene muchos gastos y quiere poder cubrirlos, también agradece por la oportunidad que recibe, que le será de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
Maricel is from Paraguari and her goal is to become an excellent system analyst so she can help those who need this service.

She is working toward getting ahead and be able to repay her family for all the help they have given her.

She is asking for a loan to be able to pay for her thesis expenses, since she already has many expenses and she wants to be able to cover them.  She is also grateful for the opportunities she receives that will be of great help.

loans.use: to pay for her thesis.

loans.name: Annet

texts.en: Annet is a single mother of three children and all her children go to school. She has no additional family members. She sells local gin. She takes care of additional family members. She has been in this business for ten years. She works seven days a week.  She gets additional income from operating a restaurant. She has applied for a loan of Ugandan shillings 600,000 from Kiva partner MCDT-SACCO in order to buy jerrycans of local gin. Her major business challenges include seasonality and thieves. She aspires to sell wholesale only and to educate her children up to university.  She resides in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expense includes bills and feeding the family.

loans.use: to buy more jerrycans of local gin.

loans.name: Lariza

texts.es:
Lariza está cursando el 4to año de la carrera de nutrición, comenta que sus padres trabajan, que tiene 4 hermanas todas profesionales y además dice que su meta es terminar su carrera y seguir estudiando de aquí a cierto tiempo. Quiere seguir creciendo, ya que es consciente que es la única forma de poder salir adelante.
Su aspiración es ser una buena profesional y ayudar en todo lo que este a su alcance a la gente que necesite.
Pide de este crédito para invertirlo en el pago de sus cuotas de universidad, y así seguir estudiando y cubrir estos gastos.
texts.en:
Lariza is in her fourth year of studying for a career as a nutritionist.  She says that her parents work and that she has four sisters, all professionals, and that her goal is to complete her studies and then continue learning from now on.  She wants to continue to grow and she is very conscience that this is the only way to get ahead.

Her aspiration is to be a good professional and help those who need it, with everything within her reach.

She is asking for this loan to pay her university expenses, continue studying, and cover these expenses.

loans.use: to pay university expenses.

loans.name: Jaymart

texts.en:
Jaymart is a 22-year-old entrepreneur who runs a motorcycle-transportation business to make a living. He has been doing this for more than two years.

Recently, he sought a loan from GDMPC microcredit to buy a helmet and accessories as required and needed for the business. 

He is hopeful of earning more income to pursue his ambition in building his own house for his family in the future.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle helmet and accessories

loans.name: Mom's Group

texts.en:
Mom is a villager from a rural area located in the Battambang province’s Moung Russey district. She is 30 years old and married, with one son, who is still too young for school. 

She is a rice farmer who has been in that business for five years. The current business earns her about KHR 40,000 per day.

This is the first loan for Mom’s group of two members. Now leading her group to apply for a loan, she wants to use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland. 

She hopes to make a better living.
